Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1983...
Released by Los Angeles on 3/2/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/2/1983 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1989, off Rich Gossage (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1989, off Dan Vossler (ATL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 8/10/1989...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1990, hitting .583 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1990, hitting .431 with 6 HR, 26 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1990, hitting .334 with 21 HR, 115 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1991, hitting .444 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 4/22/1993...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
